original_text: They killed many of their enemy's soldiers because God was fighting for them. Reuben, Gad and half of Manasseh's tribe took the land where the Hagrites had lived. They continued to live there until the exile of Judah's people.
korean_text: 죽임을 당한 자가 많았으니 이 싸움이 하나님께로 말미암았음이라 그들이 그들의 땅에 거주하여 사로잡힐 때까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: They killed many of their enemy's soldiers
because God was fighting for them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들을 위해 싸우고 계셨기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: Reuben, Gad and half of Manasseh's tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤과 갓 그리고 므낫세 반 지파는

sentences.original_text: took the land where the Hagrites had lived
until the exile of Judah's people
